member.name: M:AuthJwt.Controllers.AuthController.resetPassword(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: it is simple way to reset password. if using it then no need to send token to email and verification.

member.name: M:AuthJwt.Controllers.AuthController.sendResetPasswordToken(System.String)
